meanings.definition: A strip of leather, cardboard, or other material used to mark one's place in a book.
meanings.sent1: I always use bookmarks to keep track of where I stopped reading.
meanings.sent2: She gave me a beautiful bookmark with a quote on it as a gift.
meanings.sent3: The bookmark fell out of the book and got lost in the couch cushions.
meanings.sent4: His bookmark was like a bright flag waving in the sea of pages.
meanings.sent5: The bookmark with a tassel made it easy to find my place in the novel.
